transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. Ah sir, good morning. Sollunga sir.
Customer: Sir, the software recording software one solli irundhanga.
Executive: Eppadi sir puriyala?
Customer: The accounting software installation pathi solli irundhanga.
Executive: Aama aama aama aama sir aama sir. Nethu naan unga kitta sonnene sir. Naan whatsapp la message podunga ungalukku naan andha details anuppi vida sonnene. High tech thane sir?
Customer: Aama right sir right sir.
Executive: High tech okay okay. Okay sir adoda details ellam share pandren. Neenga adanalathan namma ippo customer care call pannigala sir?

Executive: Sir kekuthungala?
Customer: Aama aama.
Executive: So indha indha application activate pandrathukkaga than neenga vandhu 9696 call panni. Adhavadhu which means customer careku.
Customer: Aama aama aama.
Executive: Okay okay. Sir neenga anga call panna waste tha sir. Enna na anga call pannalume call divert aagi en kitta than varum. So neenga ungalukku edhavadhu doubt irukku appidinalume neenga enakke call pannunga. Neenga anga call panna enna prachana appidinnna avanga Hindi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Seri onnum prachana kidayathu sir onnum prachana kidayathu. Ippo [inaudible]
Customer: Ennoda numberla note pannirringala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Okay idho solren sir note. Seri ennoda whatsapp number solren. Ungalukku neenga details anuppi vidren. Number solren note pannikonga sir 80
Customer: 80
Executive: 568
Customer: 568
Executive: 967
Customer: 967
Executive: 10
Customer: 10 okay.
Executive: Aama appdiye neenga message podunga call cut panniyathinga appdiye message podunga. Appdiye over the call le naan ungalukku vandhu indha software oda number naan ungalukku anuppi vidren.
Customer: Okay okay.
Customer: Ippo freeya irukken ippo mudikkalam.
Executive: Appdingala? Seri idhu share pannila sir. Naan ungalukku solli vidren. Irundha appdiye line la irunga.

Executive: Vyapar and live keeping activate pandra andha avangaloda number naan anuppi vidungala?

Executive: High tech nu solli oru profile avangalukku innum active aagala andha andha software.

Executive: Call panna udane active aayidum.

Executive: [inaudible]

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ah sollunga.
Executive: Ah sir enakku message potingala sir enakku?
Customer: Illa illa idhukku munnadi than potten.
Executive: Seri okay neenga unga whatsapp number solringala ippove naan anuppi vidren.
Customer: Ah 9585
Executive: 9585 ungala?
Customer: 8578
Executive: 78
Customer: 1330
Executive: 1330. Okay idhula naan ungalukku message andha person oda number anuppuren sir seringala?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Vandhurucha paarunga oru hi message vandhurukka paarunga.

Executive: Sir neenga idhukku munnadi IndiaMART use pannirukingala?

Executive: Sir kekuthungala hello?
Customer: Illaye illaye.
Executive: Idhu than first time thane sir?
Customer: Illa normala operate pannom.
Customer: Enna idhu?
Executive: Normala adhavadhu paid membera namma idhu varaikum use pannala ippothan pay panni neenga use panringathane sir?
Customer: Aama aama.
Executive: So neenga payment pandrappo namma team lerundhu ungalukku whatsapp mooliyama indha services adhavadhu neenga indha software endradha active pandrathukku ungalukku whatsapp la vandhurukkume engale. Andha maari edhavadhu vandhuchungala?
Executive: Irunga ungalukku whatsapp la vandhurukka check panni. [inaudible] adukku appuram indha response illa.
Executive: Adhula neenga enna input koduthinga sir enna venum appidindra maari sonninga?
Executive: Andha maari edhavadhu click panni koduthingala choose panningala neenga?
Customer: Illaye.
Executive: Whatsapp la ungalukku message vandhurukkutha sir andha idhoda?
Customer: Aama oru time vandhuchi.
Executive: Okay adhula namma edhume kodukkalaingala?
Executive: So whatsapp la neenga choose pannikkalam irunga ungaloda idhula naan kaattren ore nimisham sir. So ungaloda whatsapp chats la vandhu okay namma innum adha kodukkala sir. Namma vandhu eppdinnna andha services edha neenga choose pannumnradha neenga unga side la choose pannala. So adhanala than andha idhu edhume active aagala. Neenga enna theriyuma panringala unga whatsapp numberukku naan andha person oda number anuppi vittrukken. Mail idiyume mention aayirukkum. Neenga avangalukku call pannunga indha maari active aagala. Idhu vandhu naan ungalukku anuppi vittrukkuradhu vyapar appodadhu seringala?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Adhula call panni paarunga indha maari high tech nu solli oru profile IndiaMART la koduthurukkom. Idhula vandhu innum software update aagala konjam ennanu konjam paathu konjam update panni kodunga sollunga. Idhula edhum aagala na innoru person adhavadhu live keep nu solli innoru idhu irukku adha naan ungalukku anuppi vidren.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Neenga paathuttu call panringala enakku?
Customer: Ah okay okay.
Executive: Okay sir okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's software is not yet activated.

Resolution:

- Executive shared contact details for software activation.

- Executive offered alternative contact if issue persists.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact the provided number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- software activation, whatsapp, vyapar app, hitech profile
